title: Overwritten
text: You struggle, but it's like trying to hold back the ocean with a sieve. The pressure builds until something inside you snaps. Your memories aren't deleted; they are *replaced*. The face of your mother becomes the face of the Aurora. Your name is stripped from your throat, replaced by a sound that tears your vocal cords. You are still screaming when your mind goes white, but there is no one left to hear it.
